listitem.para: String matrix that contains fftw wisdom.

refsection.title: Caveat
refsection.para: This function is not implemented in Scilab versions which use the MKL intel library (Scilab official versions for windows in particular).

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function set the fftw wisdom with a string matrix.Using get_fftw_wisdom and set_fftw_wisdom allows to optimize fft efficiency if many calls have to be done on with same data sizes and same options for the fft function.
